restrictions.title: provideService
restrictions.description: Provided that the service will not be renumerated by the Client.

reasons.title: Remark: Formalising the clients upon demand request
reasons.description: Formalising the fact that the Bank acts upon the  Client's own demand: The Advisor should add a note in the Client's file containing the following information: (i) the  Client has contacted the Bank or the Bank has only contacted the Client upon his / her own request, (ii) the  Client's reason for contacting the Bank, (iii) the services required by the Client and the services offered by the Bank, (iv) the date, and (v) the Advisor's signature.
